analysis.key_quote: This is a terrible idea. It is brought to us by those that want to ruin the functioning our government and replace dedicated public servants with sycophants and nincompoops so that those above them can grift and enrich themselves at will
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule by expressing concern about the potential for politicization and the replacement of dedicated public servants with unqualified individuals, indicating a strong opposition to the rule.
